title: New: Blooms – Love
content:
Blooms aka Louise Cunnane released her fantastic debut EP last year, and has now returned with her most complete offering to date in the form of Love.

Combining a real All Saints-esque chorus, with production from P*nut & Gil Lewis, all centred around a London Grammar style hook, it’s an intoxicating listen. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
